Derive Age Groups

Source: R/derive_aage.R
derive_agegr_fda.Rd

Functions for deriving standardized age groups.

derive_agegr_fda(dataset, age_var, new_var)

derive_agegr_ema(dataset, age_var, new_var, adults = TRUE)

Arguments

dataset

Input dataset.
age_var

AGE variable.
new_var

New variable to be created.
adults

Logical, should the age group be valid for adults studies or pediatric studies? Defaults to TRUE (adult studies).

Value

dataset with new column new_var of class factor.

Details

derive_agegr_fda Derive age groups according to FDA (https://prsinfo.clinicaltrials.gov/results_definitions.html -> Baseline Measure Information).

derive_agegr_ema Derive age groups according to EMA (https://eudract.ema.europa.eu/result.html -> Results - Data Dictionary -> Age range).

Examples

data(dm)
derive_agegr_fda(dm, AGE, AGEGR1)
#> # A tibble: 306 x 26
#>    STUDYID DOMAIN USUBJID SUBJID RFSTDTC RFENDTC RFXSTDTC RFXENDTC RFICDTC
#>    <chr>   <chr>  <chr>   <chr>  <chr>   <chr>   <chr>    <chr>    <chr>  
#>  1 CDISCP… DM     01-701… 1015   "2014-… "2014-… "2014-0… "2014-0… ""     
#>  2 CDISCP… DM     01-701… 1023   "2012-… "2012-… "2012-0… "2012-0… ""     
#>  3 CDISCP… DM     01-701… 1028   "2013-… "2014-… "2013-0… "2014-0… ""

#>  8 CDISCP… DM     01-701… 1097   "2014-… "2014-… "2014-0… "2014-0… ""

#> 10 CDISCP… DM     01-701… 1115   "2012-… "2013-… "2012-1… "2013-0… ""

#> #   DTHFL <chr>, SITEID <chr>, AGE <dbl>, AGEU <chr>, SEX <chr>, RACE <chr>,
#> #   ETHNIC <chr>, ARMCD <chr>, ARM <chr>, ACTARMCD <chr>, ACTARM <chr>,
#> #   COUNTRY <chr>, DMDTC <chr>, DMDY <dbl>, AGEGR1 <fct>

derive_agegr_fda(data.frame(age = 1:100), age_var = age, new_var = agegr1)
